title: Accumulation of oil leaking from a tanker

content.question: Oil is leaking from a tanker at the rate of R(t) = 2,000e-0.2t gallons per hour, where t is measured in hours. How much oil leaks out of the tanker from time t = 0 to t = 10 ?

topic.text: 8.3: Using Accumulation Functions and Definite Integrals in Applied Contexts
